name: Monthly Dragon Oracle: March
description:
Controls: z button and arrow keys

(Don't be alarmed that there's no music. I haven't quite figured that element out yet)

///

Have you ever wondered what the universe has planned for you?

Well, the dragon that lives deep within a mysterious forest has some answers for you. Although.....they may not be the ones you were hoping for....

///

Last month I spent a weekend chasing a silly idea that hit me like a basketball to the head, and it turned into: Monthly Dragon Oracle. Which is an incredibly short little game that sprung from my personal frustration trying to make words...work and to find a creative use of the scribbles in my notebook.

I enjoyed it so much that I decided to keep it going. 30 new randomized fortunes! New backgrounds. Same weird dragon joy with the Great Oracle.

Have a good day and enjoy!

///

If there's any issues &/ if it doesn't cycle back to the original screen in the end, please let me know and which fortune you received that time.
